title: London, BL, Add. 17268
Digital Catalogue of Syriac Manuscripts in the British Library
Psalms, according to the Peshitta version, divided, as usual, into ܡܪ̈ܡܝܬܐ and ܫܘܒ̈ܚܐ.
Canticles.
first song of Moses.
second song of Moses.
song of Mary.
Beatitudes.
Lord's Prayer.
Nicene Creed.
hymn "Gloria in excelsis."
Services for the principal canonical hours of the ferial days of the week, consisting of hymns (ܩ̈ܠܐ) and prayers of Ephraim and Jacob.
Tuesday.
Wednesday.
Thursday.
Friday.
Saturday.
Cantus ad Magnificat, ܛܟ̣ܣܐ ܕܡܘܪ̈ܒܐ, arranged according to the eight tones.
syrTitle: ܫܠ̣ܡ ܬܫܒ̈ܚܬܐ ܕܕܘܝܕ ܢܒܝܐ ܘܡܲܠܟܐ ܐܠܗܝܐ ܟܠ ܕܩ̇ܪܐ ܢܨ̇ܠܐ ܥܠ ܚܛܝܐ ܕܣܪܛ
